document_data.caption: A map showing the Blackstar Inn (labeled #9) on Blackstar Lane.
document_data.name: The Blackstar Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blackstar Inn''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The exterior windows were all barred for security, giving the inn the look of a fortress from the outside.
document_data.Location: The inn was located on the east side of [[Gut Alley]] were it was intersected by [[Blackstar Lane]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The Blackstar Inn was owned by [[Asiyra Boldwinter]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Armed guards protected the entryway and the stables.
